name: LD44 "Get Me My Drones!"
description:
This is a game made during the Ludum Dare 44 game jam. It is extremly short, not possible to win, and buggy.

Maybe we will fix and add the originally planned features, but as it stands it stays in its current form. If you are interested in participating in a jam, we would highly recommend starting with the core gamplay first and not be carried away by other things like we were.

Controls:

wasd : movement

“space” : fire your drones at the enemys (but look out, you only have the amount you see)(press not hold!)
